name: A Gleam of Hope (Youshen_is_tired)
description:
This is a game that was made over the past 6 months by a group of 3 people. All the pixel art in this game is hand drawn and it uses Godot as it's primary game engine.  The game includes a wide selection of weapons, enemies, varied levels and provides from 20 minutes up to 1 hour of gameplay depending on how pro of a gamer you are. Some levels are made to be challenging and there are weapons hidden on each level. 

Team: @youshen_is_tired, @Han Sen Ng & ngkuanyue
